definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Tiglathpileser (III), king of Assyria (Zinj. [[תגלתפלסר]], [[תגלתפליסר]], GACooke:Inscr. 178. 183. 188; = As. Tukulti-apil-êšar-ra Rost:Keilinschr. TP III (1893). 42 COT:2Ki 15:29; v. also Pinches:Ency. Bib. Tp Say:Hast. DB. TP);—2Ki 15:29, 2Ki 16:10 = [[פְּלֶ֫סֶר]] ´[[ת]]: v:2Ki 16:7; corrupt [[תִּלְּגַת פִּלְנְאֶ֫סֶר]] 1Ch 5:6, 2Ch 28:20, [[פִּלְנֶסֶר]] ´[[ת]]: 1Ch 5:26; v. also [[פּוּל]];—Algaqfellasar, Qalgaq[l]fellasar, Qalgabanasar, etc., LXXL (Kings) Qeglafalasar.
